KnowledgeBase.Title: Example Matrix compareLE 007
KnowledgeBase.RelatedFunctions: compare compareEQ compareNE compareGE compareLT compareGT

Example.Description: These examples use the compareLE function to compare two Matrices and return the Boolean value, true or false. The corresponding values of each Matrix are compared to determine whether one Matrix is lesser than or equal to the other.

Syntax.Note: The value of the first Matrix is greater than the value of the second Matrix.
The value of the first Matrix is lesser than the value of the second Matrix.
